sense.name: becoming industrialized
sense.commentary: INDUSTRIALIZATION[+event] The act of becoming industrialized or making something industrialized. Can apply to a society as a whole, or to a specific section of a society.
sense.examples: England was the first nation to experience industrialization. The industrialization of agriculture left a lot of people unemployed. I'm studying the process of industrialization in Europe. Josef Stalin's forced industrialization of the Soviet Union was, to put it lightly, a mixed blessing.
